headline: DeWine speaks at manufacturing plant in Springboro
author: Katie Shatsby
sentences: SPRINGFIELD, Ohio (WDTN) — Ohio Governor Mike DeWine visited Springboro on Monday to celebrate the relaunch of an Ohio manufacturing facility.
American Battery Solutions is an Ohio manufacturing facility that is adding capacity to meet the growing lithium-ion battery demand.
According to the governor’s office, DeWine spoke at 10:30 a.m. on April 4 at American Battery Solutions.
You can watch the press conference live in the video player above.
